DOC.brief_summary: This epidemiological , multicenter , retrospective study analyze management rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) usual clinical practice Spain . Two group patient analyze : individual RA two year less ( `` early RA '' group ) individual RA 2 year currently meet ACR criterion RA ( `` establish RA '' group ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Clinical Therapeutic Management Rheumatoid Arthritis Spain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Group 1 : early RA : patient disease last 2 year less , consider investigator early RA Group 2 : establish RA : patient disease last 2 year meet ACR criterion RA Exclusion criterion : Patients rheumatic disease different RA Participation clinical trial study last 12 month
